revisions.rev:
'''[[Heidelberg]]''' is a city of 140,000 in southwestern Germany.
'''Heidelberg''' may also refer to: {{TOCright}} ==Places== *[[Heidelberg, Victoria]], Australia *[[Heidelberg, Ontario]] (near Kitchener), Canada
*South Africa: **[[Heidelberg, Gauteng]] **[[Heidelberg, Western Cape]]
*United States: **[[Heidelberg, Kentucky]] **[[Heidelberg, Minnesota]] **[[Heidelberg, Mississippi]] **[[Heidelberg, Pennsylvania]] **[[Heidelberg, Texas]] **[[Heidelberg Street]], a neighborhood in Detroit, Michigan
==Education== *[[University of Heidelberg]], Germany *[[Heidelberg University (Ohio)]], United States *[[Colegio Heidelberg]], Gran Canaria, Spain *[[Heidelberg Centre - School of Graphic Communications Management]], Toronto, Canada
==Other uses== *[[Heidelberg School]], the Australian art movement *''[[Heidelberg Appeal]]'', 1992 scientific manifesto *[[Heidelberg Project]] by Tyree Guyton in Detroit, Michigan *[[HeidelbergCement]], a cement and building materials company *Heidelberg, brand name of [[Heidelberger Druckmaschinen]] printing presses *Heidelberg, codename for the third release of [[Fedora (operating system)|Fedora Core]], a Linux distribution *[[Heidelberg Catechism]] *[[Heidelberg Tun]] *[[Heidelberg Disputation]]
==See also== *[[Homo heidelbergensis]]
